title: Ransom Canyon Boss Breaks Down Finale Twists (R.I.P., [Spoiler]!) and Looks Ahead to Season 2
description: Life in Ransom Canyon will never be the same by the end of the Netflix western’s first season. The sexy, soapy series lassoed plenty of drama in its first 10 episodes, from a devastating tornado to the tragic loss of a town staple — Cap Fuller, played by the iconic James Brolin. Unfortunately, it’s Brolin’s […]
author: Andy Swift

title: The Rookie Boss Previews ‘Spooky’ Documentary Episode — #Chenford ‘Lie Detector Sequel’ Included!
description: ABC’s The Rookie has scared up another reason to subject Nolan, Harper et al to documentary cameras. The light procedural’s previous documentary-format episodes involved a former child actor turned cult leader, the murder of the director of onetime team member Aaron Thorsen’s reality show, and the truly rare instance of two cops arresting criminals (“Dim” […]
